ShadowSiren:ChainShock.NAME: Chain Shock
ShadowSiren:ChainShock.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! [ElectricIcon] damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

ShadowSiren:FireOrb.NAME: Fire Orb
ShadowSiren:FireOrb.DESCRIPTION: *Uses !ShadowSiren:UsesCount! NL *Attack shadowsiren:Follow-Up: NL Deal !D! [FireIcon] damage. NL *Skill shadowsiren:Follow-Up: NL Gain !M! Vigor.

ShadowSiren:HammerBag.NAME: Hammer Bag
ShadowSiren:HammerBag.DESCRIPTION: *Uses !ShadowSiren:UsesCount! NL *Skill shadowsiren:Follow-Up: NL Add a *Hammer to your hand.

ShadowSiren:HammerToss.NAME: Hammer Toss
ShadowSiren:HammerToss.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Add !M! *Hammer to your hand.

ShadowSiren:IceOrb.NAME: Ice Orb
ShadowSiren:IceOrb.DESCRIPTION: *Uses !ShadowSiren:UsesCount! NL *Attack shadowsiren:Follow-Up: NL Deal !D! [IceIcon] damage. NL *Skill shadowsiren:Follow-Up: NL Gain !B! Block.

ShadowSiren:ShadowOrb.NAME: Shadow Orb
ShadowSiren:ShadowOrb.DESCRIPTION: *Uses !ShadowSiren:UsesCount! NL *Card shadowsiren:Follow-Up: NL Deal !D! [DarkIcon] damage to ALL enemies.

ShadowSiren:ShadowSneak.NAME: Shadow Sneak
ShadowSiren:ShadowSneak.DESCRIPTION: Autoplay. NL Deal !D! [DarkIcon] damage to a random enemy. NL shadowsiren:Intensify damage by !M!.

ShadowSiren:Thunderstruck.NAME: Thunderstruck
ShadowSiren:Thunderstruck.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! [ElectricIcon] damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

ShadowSiren:WhiteOut.NAME: White Out
ShadowSiren:WhiteOut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! [IceIcon] [DarkIcon] damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
